name: stata
title: Stata
description: Powerful Stata integration for Raycast - manage .do files, run code, and access documentation
author: rony_rodriguez_ramirez

commands.name: recent-stata-do-files
commands.title: Recent Do Files
commands.description: List and open recently used .do files

commands.name: new-do-file
commands.title: New Do File
commands.description: Create a new .do file with templates

commands.name: browse-datasets
commands.title: Browse Datasets
commands.description: Find and open Stata datasets (.dta files)

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
